property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次『罗柏国王的主力军』参与的{军事}争夺后，从失败对手的阵营牌上转移1枚权力标记到一名进攻角色上。（如果有玩家正在展示一张[战争]战略牌，转移2枚权力标记以代替。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [MIL] challenge in which King Robb’s Host is participating, move 1 power from the losing opponent’s faction card to an attacking character. (2 power instead if there is a War plot card revealed.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 『凯特琳·史塔克』上每有1枚权力标记，她获得能力值+1。 响应：在你控制的一名{史塔克}角色被牺牲或被杀后，『凯特琳·史塔克』获得1枚权力标记。（每回合限制两次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Catelyn Stark gets +1 STR for each power she has. Reaction: After a [Stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, Catelyn Stark gains 1 power. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『艾德·史塔克』使用名望获得权力标记后，选择你控制的另一名参与争夺的角色。该角色获得1枚权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Eddard Stark gains power using renown, choose another participating character you control. That character gains 1 power.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『黑鱼』有4枚或更多权力标记时，你控制的所有[徒利家族]角色在被宣告为进攻者时不横置。 响应：在你作为进攻方赢得一次{军事}争夺后，补1张牌。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Blackfish has 4 or more power, each House Tully character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker. Reaction: After you win a [MIL] challenge as the attacking player, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：牺牲一名{史塔克}角色，以选择并重置一名独有{史塔克}角色。（每回合限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a [Stark] character to choose and stand a unique [Stark] character. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『北境狼群』使用隐秘避开一名角色后，该角色获得能力值-X直到本阶段结束。X等于你控制的[冰原狼]卡牌数。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Wolves of the North bypasses a character using stealth, that character gets -X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of Direwolf cards you control.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你控制的一名{史塔克}角色被杀后，牺牲『艾莉亚·史塔克』，以选择并杀死一名能力值不高于3的角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a [Stark] character you control is killed, sacrifice Arya Stark to choose and kill a character with STR 3 or lower.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当你控制的一名独有{史塔克}角色将要被杀时，牺牲『乔里·凯索』，以援救该角色。然后，如果有玩家正在展示一张[寒冬]战略牌，该角色获得1枚权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a unique [Stark] character you control would be killed, sacrifice Jory Cassel to save it. Then, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, that character gains 1 power.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『奔流城的吟游诗人』进场后，选择一名[徒利家族]角色。该角色获得1枚权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Riverrun Minstrel enters play, choose a House Tully character. That character gains 1 power.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当一张战略牌被展示时，横置『老奶妈』，以使该战略牌获得[盛夏]或[寒冬]属性直到本回合结束。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a plot card is revealed, kneel Old Nan to have that plot card gain the Summer or Winter trait until the end of the round.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 争夺行动：将『欧莎』移出争夺。然后，将其重置。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Remove Osha from the challenge. Then, stand her. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『熊岛效忠者』参与争夺时，你控制的每名参与争夺的其他{史塔克}角色获得“免疫对手的事件”。

property.name: Text
property.value: While Bear Island Loyalist is participating in a challenge, each other participating [Stark] character you control gains “immune to opponents' events.”

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你的死亡牌堆中每有一名{史塔克}角色，『珊莎·史塔克』获得能力值-1。 当『珊莎·史塔克』能力值为0时，她获得洞察

property.name: Text
property.value: Sansa Stark gets -1 STR for each [Stark] character in your dead pile. While Sansa Stark’s STR is 0, she gains insight.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当你控制『瑞肯·史塔克』时，他获得能力值+2并获得一个{军事}符号。

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control Rickon Stark, he gets +2 STR and gains a [MIL] icon.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 备战行动：从你控制的一名角色上弃除1枚权力标记，以使本阶段中你备战的下一名[徒利家族]或[七神]角色费用减2。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Discard 1 power from a character you control to reduce the cost of the next House Tully or The Seven character you marshal this phase by 2. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当一个包含词语“搜寻”的触发能力效果将要发动时，牺牲『瑞肯·史塔克』，以取消该能力的效果。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered ability with the word “search” in it would initiate, sacrifice Rickon Stark to cancel those effects.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你控制的每名{史塔克}角色获得能力值+1。 响应：在一次争夺被发起后，横置『临冬城』。然后，所有正在展示非[寒冬]战略牌的玩家不能触发卡牌能力，直到本次争夺结束。

property.name: Text
property.value: Each [Stark] character you control gets +1 STR. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated, kneel Winterfell. Then, each player with a non-Winter plot card revealed cannot trigger card abilities until the end of the challenge.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在一个阶段开始后，牺牲『临冬城心树』，以选择你控制的一张{史塔克}卡牌。直到本阶段结束，该卡牌获得“免疫对手的战略效果”。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a phase begins, sacrifice Winterfell Heart Tree to choose a [Stark] card you control. Until the end of the phase, that card gains “immune to opponents’ plot effects.”

property.name: 能力
property.value: 独有{史塔克}角色专用。 所附属角色获得威吓。 行动：支付1枚金币，以将『娜梅莉亚』附属到一名不同的角色。（每阶段限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique [Stark] character only. Attached character gains intimidate. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Nymeria to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: {史塔克}角色专用。 所附属觉得获得能力值+2。 打断：当所附属角色被牺牲时，牺牲『缝衣针』，以将该角色返回你的手牌，以代替将其放入你的弃牌堆。

property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Interrupt: When attached character is sacrificed, sacrifice Needle to return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 印刷费用不高于3的非限制地区专用。终结. 忽略所附属地区的印刷规则文字（[属性]除外）

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower only. Treat attached location’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: 能力
property.value: 仅在你已使用的战略牌堆中有[寒冬]战略牌时打出。 响应：在你控制的一名{史塔克}角色被牺牲或被杀后，将一名印刷费用不高于该角色的{史塔克}角色从你的手牌中放置进场。

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if there is a Winter plot card in your used pile. Reaction: After a [Stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, put a [Stark] character with equal or lower printed cost into play from your hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当对手的一张事件效果将要发动时，牺牲一张[冰原狼]卡牌或横置2名{史塔克}角色，以取消该事件的效果。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent’s event would initiate, sacrifice a Direwolf card or kneel 2 [Stark] characters to cancel those effects.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：将一个附属从你控制的一名{史塔克}角色上转移到你控制的另一名合理的角色上。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move an attachment from a [Stark] character you control to another eligible character you control.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 对手角色专用。 所附属角色获得[弄臣]属性。 响应：在所附属角色被宣告为进攻者或防御者后，从其控制者的手牌中随机弃除1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent’s character only. Attached character gains the Fool trait. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker or defender, discard 1 card at random from its controller’s hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：选择每位玩家控制的一名未横置的角色。横置所有被选择的角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a standing character controlled by each player. Kneel each of those characters.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当『鱼胡子』进攻时，如果展示中的[寒冬]战略牌多于[盛夏]战略牌，每名防御角色在该争夺中不计其能力值。

property.name: Text
property.value: While Fishwhiskers is attacking, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, each defending character does not contribute its STR to that challenge.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当你比较优先值时，你展示中的战略牌获得优先值+3直到本阶段结束。如果本阶段中你赢得优先，补1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you compare initiative, your revealed plot card gets +3 initiative until the end of the phase. If you win initiative this phase, draw 1 card.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当『十字路口雇佣兵』于争夺阶段中被杀后，获得2枚金币。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When Crossroads Sellsword is killed during the challenges phase, gain 2 gold.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你赢得一次{阴谋}争夺后，横置『首相塔』并将一名参与争夺的{兰尼斯特}角色返回你的手牌，以选择失败的对手控制的一名印刷费用低于该{兰尼斯特}角色的角色。将该角色返回其拥有者的手牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win an [INT] challenge, kneel Tower of the Hand and return a participating [Lannister] character to your hand to choose a character with lower printed cost controlled by the losing opponent. Return that character to its owner’s hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当你非起始玩家时，『昆廷·马泰尔』获得能力值+1并获得隐秘。 打断：当『昆廷·马泰尔』被杀时，选择并杀死一名能力值低于他的角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are not the first player, Quentyn Martell gets +1 STR and gains stealth. Interrupt: When Quentyn Martell is killed, choose and kill a character with a lower STR than his.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你作为防御方输掉一次{军事}或{权力}争夺后，查看获胜对手的手牌。然后，从该手牌中选择并弃除1张牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a [MIL] or [POW] challenge as the defending player, look at the winning opponent’s hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在『石蛇』使用隐秘避开一名角色后，选择该角色的一个关键词。『石蛇』获得该关键词直到本阶段结束。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Stonesnake bypasses a character using stealth, choose one of that character’s keywords. Stonesnake gains that keyword until the end of the phase.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在你作为防御方赢得一次争夺后，横置『影子塔』，以选择失败的对手控制的一名角色。本阶段中该角色不能被宣告为进攻者。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, kneel The Shadow Tower to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. That character cannot be declared as an attacker this phase.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：如果有玩家正在展示一张[盛夏]战略牌，选择并重置一名[血盟卫]角色。（每回合限制一次。）

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: If there is a Summer plot card revealed, choose and stand a Bloodrider character. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：每名参与争夺的非[真龙]角色获得能力值-1直到本次争夺结束。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Each participating non-Dragon character gets -1 STR until the end of the challenge.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 强制响应：在『佛罗伦家族骑士』进场后，选择场上能力值最低的一名角色，并将其从场上弃除。

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After House Florent Knight enters play, choose a character with the lowest STR in play, and discard it from play.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 备战行动：选择你控制的一名{提利尔}角色。获得X枚金币，X等于该角色的能力值。然后，牺牲该角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Choose a [Tyrell] character you control. Gain X gold, where X is that character’s STR. Then, sacrifice that character.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 你手牌中的每名[野人]角色获得伏击(X)。X等于该[野人]卡牌的印刷费用。 当有玩家正在展示一张[寒冬]战略牌时，你所有[野人]角色的伏击费用减1。

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Wildling character in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card’s printed cost. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the cost to ambush each of your Wildling characters by 1.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当你阵营牌上的权力标记少于一位对手时，『年轻的矛妇』获得隐秘。

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have less power on your faction card than an opponent, Young Spearwife gains stealth.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：横置『比武场』，以使本阶段中你打出的下一张事件费用减1。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Tourney Grounds to reduce the cost of the next event you play this phase by 1.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 响应：在所附属角色横置后，查看你牌组顶的牌。你可以将该卡牌放置到你的牌组底。

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After attached character is knelt, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当你控制的一名非[军队]角色将要被杀时，横置一名[学士]角色，以援救该角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a non-Army character you control would be killed, kneel a Maester character to save it.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 行动：横置一名中立角色，以获得2枚金币。

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel a neutral character to gain 2 gold.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 展示后：从你的牌组中搜寻一张[冰原狼]卡牌，将其展示，并加入你的手牌。如果该卡牌的印刷费用不高于3，你可以将其放置进场以代替。将你的牌组洗牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. If that card’s printed cost is 3 or lower, you may put it into play instead. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 展示后：牺牲你控制的一名角色。

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Sacrifice a character you control.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 将每张展示中的战略牌基础优先值视为0。

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat the base initiative value on each revealed plot card as if it were 0.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 展示后：每位没有展示[盛夏]战略牌的玩家从他/她控制的一张牌上弃除1枚权力标记。

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player without a Summer plot revealed discards 1 power from a card he or she controls.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 当没有玩家正在展示[寒冬]战略牌时，你控制的每名角色获得能力值+1。

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, each character you control gets +1 STR.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 强制响应：在争夺阶段开始后，将所有印刷卡牌类型为附属的牌返回其拥有者手牌。

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, return each card with the printed attachment cardtype to its owner’s hand.

property.name: 能力
property.value: 打断：当赋税阶段结束时，选择一项：补2张牌，或获得3枚金币。

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the taxation phase ends, either: draw 2 cards or gain 3 gold.
